author: AP
title: Serbia striker Prijovic arrested for flouting virus curfew
description: Serbia soccer player Aleksandar Prijovic has been arrested for flouting the curfew imposed to curb the coronavirus spread
content:
BELGRADE, Serbia (AP) — Serbia soccer player Aleksandar Prijovic has been arrested for flouting the curfew imposed to curb the coronavirus spread. 
A police statement said on Saturday that Prijovic and 19 others had gathered at a hotel in Belgrade, violating… [+470 chars]
